text: Abraham "Abe" Fortas (June 19, 1910 â€“ April 5, 1982) was an American lawyer. He was a U.S. Supreme Court Associate Justice from 1965 to 1969. Fortas died from an aortic rupture on April 5, 1982 in Washington, D.C. at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Deaths from aortic aneurysm Category:Lawyers from Memphis, Tennessee Category:United States Supreme Court justices Category:Politicians from Memphis, Tennessee Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C.
